short_definition: Display of a group of persons assembled by the police who are shown to a witness or a victim according to definite lawful standards and procedures whereby the witness or victim is asked to identify the criminal suspect if he is able to do so.
long_definition_html: Display of a group of persons assembled by the police who are shown to a witness or a victim according to definite lawful standards and procedures whereby the witness or victim is asked to identify the criminal suspect if he is able to do so.
long_definition_markdown: Display of a group of persons assembled by the police who are shown to a witness or a victim according to definite lawful standards and procedures whereby the witness or victim is asked to identify the criminal suspect if he is able to do so.
long_definition_text: Display of a group of persons assembled by the police who are shown to a witness or a victim according to definite lawful standards and procedures whereby the witness or victim is asked to identify the criminal suspect if he is able to do so.
